scripts.pkg:install: cd server && pnpm i && cd ../addtocart && pnpm i && cd ../cart && pnpm i && cd ../home && pnpm i && cd ../pdp && pnpm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server; pnpm start:dev" "cd addtocart; pnpm start:live"  "cd cart; pnpm start:live"  "cd home; pnpm start:live"  "cd pdp; pnpm start:live"
